ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would summarize this course as an excellent introduction to cultural sociology and a useful primer on a number of important issues in sociology more generally. I consider this course indispensable for my studies so far.
Would recommend to anyone interested in cultural analysis. Helps one to see beneath the surface of cultural trends and analyze from a perspective that is often neglected in other cultural approaches.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I found this course very helpful for getting a sense of the range of work being done it cultural sociology and the intellectual roots of this work with respect to major debates in the discipline. This has been particularly useful for thinking about my own research and how to attend to culture within my topic of interest.
